Regulation Name(s): Tissue transglutaminase autoantibodies immunological test system, Antigen and Control
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for EliA Celikey IgA Immunoassay and EliA Celiac Control for semi-quantitative measurement of IgA antibodies to tissue transglutaminase in serum and plasma as aid in celiac disease diagnosis
Indications for Use Summary: EliA Celikey IgA Immunoassay is intended for semi-quantitative measurement of IgA antibodies to tissue transglutaminase in human serum and plasma as aid in diagnosis of celiac disease; EliA Celiac Control is intended for laboratory monitoring of in vitro measurement of antibodies to tissue transglutaminase using ImmunoCAP 100/250
